# clickup Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    clickup = {
      source = "catdevman/clickup"
    }
  }
}

provider "clickup" {
  api_token = "API_KEY"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) ClickUp API Token - needed to talk to ClickUp API
